# INTRODUCTION {.scrollable}
Control structure or control flow involves guiding your program to make certain decisions and to repeat certain actions.

## Example
::: {.incremental}
- You have a range of number from one to 1000
  - Label all the even numbers `A` and all odd numbers `B`
- Given the population of a group of people, categorize them into the stages of human growth and development according to their age:
  - Infant
  - Toddlers
  - Childhood
  - Adolescence
  - Adulthood
:::
